level.text: Any adversely impacted party may dispute the actions of a local exchange carrier or VoIP service provider related to the provisioning of Universal Services. The adversely affected party may contact the Fund Administrator for resolution of the dispute.

If resolution is not achieved, the local exchange carrier, VoIP service provider, other adversely affected party, or Fund Administrator may file an application requesting the Commission to resolve the dispute.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 50 DCR 8198 (October 3, 2003); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 10343, 10344 (December 9, 2011).
